prompts.prompt:
Generate a 16:9 landscape image.

A magnificent magical library stretching impossibly high, with floating bookshelves reaching into clouds. Books fly through the air like birds. Warm golden light streams through tall arched windows. A glowing door marked "FORBIDDEN SECTION" is visible in the background, guarded by a large owl silhouette perched above it. Magical sparkles and floating candles fill the air. No people in this scene.

Pixar-adjacent storybook style, soft painterly rendering, children's book illustration, magical atmosphere, warm inviting colors.

Generate a 16:9 landscape image.

Three young wizard children each separately standing at the entrance of a magical library, looking up at a large grumpy owl perched above a glowing door. A small ink blob creature (Blot) hides behind the children's legs.

Left side of image: A 7-year-old boy with short slightly messy brown hair, brown eyes, rosy cheeks, wearing wizard robes with DARK BLUE and GOLD accents.

Center of image: A 5-year-old boy with short slightly messy brown hair, brown eyes, rosy cheeks, wearing wizard robes with ORANGE and BRONZE accents.

Right side of image: A 3-year-old girl with shoulder-length wavy brown hair, big brown eyes, very rosy cheeks, wearing a PINK wizard dress with SILVER sparkles and a tiny pointed hat.

The owl is large with gray and white feathers, wearing tiny round spectacles, looking down sternly. Flying books visible in the background. The glowing door behind the owl says "FORBIDDEN". Feet visible on the library floor. NOT overlapping, NOT touching.

Pixar-adjacent storybook style, soft painterly rendering, children's book illustration.

Generate a 16:9 landscape image.

A dark chamber with a shimmering magical portal window floating in the center, showing a swirling other dimension with floating books, stars, and cosmic colors visible through it. A 7-year-old boy wizard with short messy brown hair, wearing DARK BLUE and GOLD robes, stands before the portal, reaching toward it. A small ink blob creature with big curious eyes floats nearby, transformed into a tiny magnifying glass shape. A large owl with spectacles watches from a pedestal.

Magical ethereal lighting from the portal. The portal glows with purple and blue swirling energy. Feet visible on stone floor.

Pixar-adjacent storybook style, soft painterly rendering, children's book illustration.

Generate a 16:9 landscape image.

Chaos in a magical library! Books are flying everywhere like startled birds. Three young wizard children each separately reacting to the book chaos. A large dictionary with legs is stomping. Comic books bounce off walls. A small picture book cowers in the corner.

Left side of image: A 7-year-old boy with short messy brown hair, DARK BLUE and GOLD wizard robes, looking at a stomping dictionary.

Center of image: A 5-year-old boy with short messy brown hair, ORANGE and BRONZE wizard robes, reaching toward flying comic books.

Right side of image: A 3-year-old girl with wavy brown hair, PINK wizard dress with SILVER sparkles, tiny pointed hat, reaching toward a scared picture book.

A small ink blob creature with big eyes ducks between flying books. An owl with spectacles looks alarmed. Books flying in all directions. Feet visible on library floor. NOT overlapping, NOT touching.

Pixar-adjacent storybook style, soft painterly rendering, children's book illustration, dynamic action scene.

Generate a 16:9 landscape image.

A massive ancient stone door covered in glowing orange runes. A 5-year-old boy wizard with short messy brown hair, wearing ORANGE and BRONZE robes, stands before it with hand raised toward the door. Orange magical energy glows around his hand. A small ink blob creature has transformed into a cheerleader shape with tiny pom-poms. A large owl with spectacles watches from the side. Two other children (a boy in DARK BLUE robes and a small girl in PINK dress) watch from behind.

The runes on the door pulse with warm orange light. Mystical atmosphere. Feet visible on stone floor.

Pixar-adjacent storybook style, soft painterly rendering, children's book illustration.

The other two children (boy in DARK BLUE, girl in PINK) watch from behind. A small ink blob creature points at the key. An owl with spectacles sighs in the background.

Generate a 16:9 landscape image.

A dramatic scene in the library - black ink flooding across the floor! Three young wizard children each separately climbing up tall bookshelves to escape the rising ink.

Left side of image: A 7-year-old boy with short messy brown hair, DARK BLUE and GOLD wizard robes, climbing a bookshelf, grabbing books to save them.

Center of image: A 5-year-old boy with short messy brown hair, ORANGE and BRONZE wizard robes, leaping between shelves heroically.

Right side of image: A 3-year-old girl with wavy brown hair, PINK wizard dress with SILVER sparkles, being helped up by a small ink blob creature that has formed into a slide.

Black ink spreading across the floor below. A tipped over giant inkwell visible. An owl with spectacles flapping wings in alarm. Books on lower shelves in danger. NOT overlapping, NOT touching.

Pixar-adjacent storybook style, soft painterly rendering, children's book illustration, dramatic lighting.

Generate a 16:9 landscape image.

A 7-year-old boy wizard with short messy brown hair, wearing DARK BLUE and GOLD robes, standing before four floating magical symbols arranged in a circle: a glowing silver MOON, a golden STAR, an orange FLAME, and a blue WATER DROP. His eyes are focused in concentration, hand outstretched toward the symbols. The symbols glow and pulse with magical energy.

Behind him, a 5-year-old boy in ORANGE robes and a 3-year-old girl in PINK dress watch in awe. A small ink blob creature bounces excitedly. A large owl with spectacles watches intently.

Magical sparkling atmosphere. The symbols cast colored light on everything. Feet visible on stone floor.

Pixar-adjacent storybook style, soft painterly rendering, children's book illustration.

Behind her, two boys (one in DARK BLUE robes, one in ORANGE robes) watch with smiles. A small ink blob creature bounces with joy - butterflies are landing on it too! A large owl with spectacles actually SMILES warmly.
